page.title: 04Parkwood Junior School.
page.content: Our school was opened in 1967. It is on the South Western edge of Scunthorpe. The infant and junior schools are joined together by the kitchen. There are climbing frames in the playgrounds on the grassy areas. The greenhouse is next to the 4th. year playground. We have 3 playgrounds. In each playground we have seats and bins. Wire fences are all around the perimeter of the school. There are two fields. The larger one is for games and sports and is shared with the infants. We can use the other at playtimes when it's dry. We have 10 classes at the moment. (A few years ago there were 13.) Next year there will only be 9 classes.
